alert.note: Alert for Maricopa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 01 at 2:54AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of south central Arizona, including the following county, Maricopa. * WHEN...Until 645 AM MST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 252 AM MST, gauge reports indicated that Deadman Wash has risen above flood stage as a result of excessive runoff from earlier heavy rainfall. This will impact areas along the wash, which flows into Paloma Park downstream. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Paloma Park. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
